mapper.select: select s.id as s_id, s.class_id, s.name, s.sex, s.birth, s.ring_number, s.ring_phone, s.creation_date, s.available, s.identify_code, psm.parent_id, psm.student_id, psm.relationship, psm.approved, psm.approved_date, cls.id as cls_id, cls.school_id, cls.grade, cls.class, cls.available, cls.head_teacher_id, scl.id as scl_id, scl.name as schoolName from student s left join parent_student_map psm on s.id = psm.student_id left join class cls on cls.id = s.class_id left join school scl on scl.id =cls.school_id where psm.parent_id = #{parentId}

select s.id as studentId, s.name as name FROM student s INNER JOIN class cls ON s.class_id = cls.id INNER JOIN teacher_class_map tcm ON cls.id = tcm.class_id INNER JOIN parent_student_map psm ON psm.student_id = s.id where tcm.teacher_id = #{teacherId} AND psm.approved =1
select s.id as s_id, s.class_id, s.name, s.sex, s.birth, s.ring_number, s.ring_phone, s.creation_date, s.available, s.identify_code from student s where s.id = #{studentId}
select s.id as s_id, s.class_id, s.name, s.sex, s.birth, s.ring_number, s.ring_phone, s.creation_date, s.available, s.identify_code from student s where s.identify_code = #{identifyCode} limit 0,1;
select s.id as studentId, s.name as name FROM student s INNER JOIN parent_student_map psm ON psm.student_id = s.id where s.class_id = #{classId} AND psm.approved =1
SELECT parent_id, student_id, relationship, approved, approved_date, creation_date, last_update_date FROM parent_student_map where student_id = #{studentId};
SELECT s.id as s_id, s.class_id, s.name, s.sex, s.birth, s.ring_number, s.ring_phone, s.available, s.creation_date, s.last_update_date,s.identify_code FROM student s WHERE s.class_id = #{classId}
